```{r}
#| label: packages
library(quartose)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Example 1: Writing tabs

```{r}
#| label: basic
#| results: asis
txt <- "this is some text"
pic <- ggplot(mpg, aes(displ, hwy)) + geom_point()
mod <- lm(hwy ~ displ, mpg)

tabs(
  "hello baby" = txt, 
  "it is cold" = pic, 
  "ur outside" = mod
)
```


## Example 2: Programming tabs and headers

```{r}
#| label: programmatic
#| results: asis
for(m in month.name[1:3]) {
  header(.title = m, .level = 3)

  df <- tibble::tibble(
    x = rnorm(100),
    y = rnorm(100)
  )

  knitr::knit_print(tabs(
    "Data" = df,
    "Plot" = ggplot(df, aes(x, y)) + geom_point(),
    .level = 4
  ))
}
```
